<rule id="javax-to-jakarta-properties-00001" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="{*}.xml" pattern="<property name="javax."/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Rename properties prefixed by javax with jakarta ">
                        <message>Rename properties prefixed by `javax` with `jakarta` </message>
                        <link href="https://jakarta.ee/" title="Jakarta EE"/>
                        <quickfix name="javax-replace-properties" type="REPLACE">
                            <replacement>jakarta</replacement>
                            <search>javax</search>
                        </quickfix>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
